item.title: Client Error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Dblocknc005 Dblocknc005
item.description:
@Dblocknc005 wrote:

Goto Or Ctrl+G Isn’t Highlighted In my Text Editor For My Client.java Text File

item.title: Client Error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

Hold down “ctrl + g” while the client class is visible on your screen - type 4685 and it will take you to that line.
